headline: Caterpillar (NYSE:CAT) Increases Quarterly Dividend By US$0.10 To US$1.51 Per Share
summary: Caterpillar (NYSE:CAT) recently announced a quarterly dividend increase of 7%, raising it to $1.51 per share, which adds to the positive sentiment around the company. Over the last quarter, the stock saw an 8.95% increase, aligning with favorable market trends, as the S&P 500 approached its all-time high. Positive corporate developments, such as the appointment of Joseph E. Creed as CEO and strategic innovations presented at bauma Munich 2025, contribute to Caterpillar's steady performance...
